resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Altra vindicta non quero che rasone/Che la vertu sera l'eschusa mya/Ben qu'el pensare, dolore me sya/El no se passa cussi de legero.
resource.chars: Altra vindicta non quero che rasone/Che la vertu sera l'eschusa mya/Ben qu'el pensare, dolore me sya/El no se passa cussi de legero.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1331.17532,1433.16833h402.53826v0h402.53826v126.75649v126.75649h-402.53826h-402.53826v-126.75649z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"nonHoverStrokeColor":["Color",0,0.74902,1],"editable":true}" id="rectangle_e7ee650a-fe5f-488a-a066-4a9b30b3e11b" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="7.29499" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Ben lo sa dio se sum vergine e pura/Che en ben fare spero/Che falsa infamia non remove el vero/Se jalosia me pon(e) falsa casone,/Non posso contra la fortuna rea.
resource.chars: Ben lo sa dio se sum vergine e pura/Che en ben fare spero/Che falsa infamia non remove el vero/Se jalosia me pon(e) falsa casone,/Non posso contra la fortuna rea.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M684.82693,441.13003h747.59641v0h747.59641v650.3006v650.3006h-747.59641h-747.59641v-650.3006z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"nonHoverStrokeColor":["Color",0,0.74902,1],"editable":true,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null}" id="rectangle_ac917bbd-28e2-45c2-baa6-8a220a612d99" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="10.89136" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: A tollere grando suspecto del mal pensare/Ma solo prego dio justo seignore/Que abia pieta de me pura donzela.
resource.chars: A tollere grando suspecto del mal pensare/Ma solo prego dio justo seignore/Que abia pieta de me pura donzela.
